attributes.action: invite Barack Obama and John McCain to speak in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the presumptive nominees of the Democrat and Republican parties respectively, Barack Obama and John McCain will yield huge influence in the world and be intrinsic to the special relationship between the UK and US. We ask the prime minister to extend an invitation to both men and give the people of the UK a first hand opportunity to hear them discuss issues relevant to the future of the world and the relationship between our two nations.
